meanings.sent1: The puppeteers made the puppet dance beautifully on stage.
meanings.sent2: During the show, the puppeteers moved the puppets with skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as the puppeteers made the puppet trip over its own strings.
meanings.sent4: Watching the puppeteers work, it felt like the puppets had a life of their own.
meanings.sent5: The puppeteers' hands moved swiftly, bringing the puppets to life in a magical way.

meanings.definition: Those who control puppets in a performance.
meanings.sent1: The puppeteers controlled the puppets' movements with finesse.
meanings.sent2: Audiences were amazed by the skill of the puppeteers during the puppet show.
meanings.sent3: One of the puppeteers accidentally made the puppet do a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: The puppeteers' influence over the puppets was like a silent dance of control.
meanings.sent5: The puppeteers' teamwork was evident in the seamless puppet performance they delivered.
